Class YahtzeeController

java.lang.Object
yahtzee.YahtzeeController
public class YahtzeeController extends Object
This class defines methods to interact with the Yahtzee model, serving as the controller in the MVC design.

    • rollDice

      public int[] rollDice()
      Rolls the dice and returns the resulting values.
      Returns:
      An array of integers representing the rolled dice values.

    • recordScore

      public void recordScore(YahtzeeCategory category, int[] dice)
      Records the score for the specified category based on the rolled dice.
      Parameters:
      category - - The YahtzeeCategory to record the score for.
      dice - - An array of integers representing the rolled dice values.

    • recordBonusYahtzee

      public boolean recordBonusYahtzee(int[] dice)
      Records a bonus Yahtzee if applicable based on the rolled dice.
      Parameters:
      dice - - An array of integers representing the rolled dice values.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether a bonus Yahtzee was recorded.
